article:
__NOTOC__ 'Auto detailing' (British English: 'Car valeting'), is the performance
of an extremely thorough cleaning, polishing and waxing of an automobile, both
inside and out, to produce a show-quality level of detail. Besides improving
appearance, detailing helps to preserve resale value of a car.

Today, the United States has more than 50,000 detailers in operation. Some are
franchisees of national auto detailing chains. Many auto detailing services can
also help enhance the visual aspects of a vehicle before a car show.
